typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		HIGH_pid as short,
		business_rule as string,
		combo as double,
		created_date as integer,
		descriptions as string,
		exclusiveTriggers as string,
		experiment_id as string,
		group_id as string,
		group_name as boolean,
		images as string,
		is_combo as boolean,
		poc_code as integer,
		preferred_pid as short,
		quantity as boolean,
		rating as double,
		recommendation_id_type as string,
		recommendation_ts as string,
		score as short,
		trigger_ratio_based_on_sku_value as double,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 0,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(created_date==20210308)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		poc_code as string,
		preferred_pid as string,
		recommendation_id_type as string,
		rating as string,
		type as string,
		quantity as string,
		recommendation_ts as string,
		HIGH_pid as string,
		group_id as string,
		group_name as string,
		business_rule as string,
		experiment_id as string,
		score as string,
		trigger_ratio_based_on_sku_value as string,
		descriptions as string,
		exclusiveTriggers as string,
		images as string,
		combo as string,
		is_combo as string,
		created_date as string
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/created_date']) ~> sink1
